meanings.definition: A traditional Italian appetizer typically consisting of cured meats, cheeses, olives, and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: The antipasto at the party was a delicious mix of meats and cheeses.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed a variety of olives and vegetables in the antipasto platter.
meanings.sent3: The antipasto plate looked like a colorful painting of food.
meanings.sent4: The antipasto spread was a symphony of flavors on the table.
meanings.sent5: The antipasto selection made my taste buds dance with joy.

meanings.definition: A dish served before the main course of a meal.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served a delightful antipasto before our pasta.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to the antipasto when dining out.
meanings.sent3: The antipasto was like a tasty preview of the meal to come.
meanings.sent4: The antipasto acted as a delicious opening act for our dinner.
meanings.sent5: The antipasto set the stage for a memorable dining experience.
